title: The Sims 4 All Expansion Pack DLC
description:
Although this expansion pack is cracked it still required to be played on the sims 4 based game in order for it to work!
So i have included a folder with the base game installation files inside the package as well :)

But DON'T WORRY these files are consider to be safe for your pc/macbook devices. 
These files have already been scan and protected by an antivirus detecting software that has recommended to say that the files are 100% Virus Free!!
Lets Start The Tutorial==================>>>>>

  ******************** SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS **********************

OS: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 8, or Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
PROCESSOR: 1.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon 64 Dual-Core 4000+ or equivalent (For computers using built-in graphics chipsets, the game requires 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.0 GHz AMD Turion 64 X2 TL-62 or equivalent)
MEMORY: At least 2 GB RAM
HARD DRIVE: At least 9 GB of free space with at least 1 GB additional space for custom content and saved games
DVD-ROM: DVD ROM drive required for installation only
VIDEO CARD: 128 MB of Video RAM and support for Pixel Shader 3.0. Supported Video Cards: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or better, ATI Radeon X1300 or better, Intel GMA X4500 or better
SOUND CARD: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
DIRECTX: DirectX 9.0c compatible

  ******************** INSTRUCTIONS *****************************

Step 1: Unzip the download rar file with a program called "winrar" if you do not have winrar install on your computer, then please go to this website: http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm to download the winrar setup.exe to install the program on your pc.
Step 2: After installing winrar application on your pc and have extracted the files, Please move on to step 3.
Step 3: In the folder you have extracted you see (2) folders. Click on The Sims 4 Step 1 Base Game Installation folder to open it.
Step 4: Once its open look for the sims 4 setup.exe application. Click on it to start the installation process.
Step 5: Once the installation is finish, exit out from the sims 4 step 1 setup folder. And move on to step 6.
Step 6: Now open The Sims 4 Step 2 Copy All Files folder. As you can see there are some folders and (2) exe applications files. Select the items by using CTRL + A on keyboard.
Step 7: After selecting all the files press and hold the CTRL button and DESELECT the following (3) files: "Soundtrack", "EA.Game.RegFix.exe" and "EASetup.exe" 
Step 8: Once done that Copy the files that are SELECTED and paste them to where your sims 4 game is install on your computer. Example: If the sims 4 install to your C: drive then it will be C:Program FilesR.G. MechanicsThe Sims 4 for (Windows 32 & 64)
Step 9: Paste the files that you have copied in the sims 4 folder. If it asks you to Replace Files while copying Select Replace Files and hit the continue button.
Step 10: Once you have finish copying all the files to the game folder you can now exit the folder and Run The Sims 4 application on your computer test it and it will WORK!!!

Thank you for downloading The Sims 4 All Expansion Pack. If you guys have any questions feel free to leave your inquires down in the comment section down below or you may contact me by my email:if you need any help!
And if you do find my video tutorial helpful please consider yourself to subscribe for more video like these and also give the video a big thumbup and share it with your friends if this tutorial helps you.

Thanks for watching and do ENJOY!!!! :)
